original: 7 Anusayayamaka
analyzed: anu saya yamaka
translated: The section on the underlying tendencies

original: 7.2 Mahāvāra🔽7.2.2. Sānusayavāra
analyzed: mahāvāra  sānusayavāra
translated: The long section🔽… The section on the underlying tendencies

original: 7.2.2.1. Anulomapuggala🔽Yo kāmarāgānusayena sānusayo so paṭighānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.
analyzed: anuloma puggala  yaḥ kāma rāga anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ paṭigha anusayena sa anusayaḥ iti āmantā
translated: … The forward order of persons🔽Is anyone who has the underlying tendency of lust also one who has the underlying tendency of aversion? Yes.

original: Yo vā pana paṭighānusayena sānusayo so kāmarāgānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.🔽Yo kāmarāgānusayena sānusayo so mānānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana paṭigha anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ kāma rāga anusayena sa anusayaḥ iti āmantā  yaḥ kāma rāga anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ māna anusayena sa anusayaḥ iti āmantā
translated: Or is anyone who has the underlying tendency of aversion also one who has the underlying tendency of lust? Yes.🔽Is anyone who has the underlying tendency of lust also one who has the underlying tendency of conceit? Yes.

original: Yo vā pana mānānusayena sānusayo so kāmarāgānusayena sānusayoti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana māna anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ kāma rāga anusayena sa anusayaḥ iti
translated: Or is anyone who has the underlying tendency of conceit also one who has the underlying tendency of lust?

original: Anāgāmī mānānusayena sānusayo, no ca kāmarāgānusayena sānusayo. Tayo puggalā mānānusayena ca sānusayā kāmarāgānusayena ca sānusayā.
analyzed: anāgāmī māna anusayena sa anusayaḥ no ca kāma rāga anusayena sa anusayaḥ tayo puggalā māna anusayena ca sa anusayā kāma rāga anusayena ca sa anusayā
translated: A non-returner is one who has the underlying tendency of conceit but not the underlying tendency of lust. Three persons are those who have the underlying tendency of conceit and also the underlying tendency of lust.

original: Yo kāmarāgānusayena sānusayo so diṭṭhānusayena …pe… vicikicchānusayena sānusayoti?
analyzed: yaḥ kāma rāga anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ diṭṭha anusayena pe vicikicchā anusayena sa anusayaḥ ti
translated: Is anyone who has the underlying tendency of lust also one who has the underlying tendency of the view of existence … the underlying tendency of the view of holding a particular view as paramount … the underlying tendency of the view of sensual pleasure … the underlying tendency of the underlying tendency of doubt?

original: Dve puggalā kāmarāgānusayena sānusayā, no ca vicikicchānusayena sānusayā. Puthujjano kāmarāgānusayena ca sānusayo vicikicchānusayena ca sānusayo.
analyzed: dve puggalā kāma rāga anusayena sa anusayā no ca vicikicchā anusayena sa anusayā puthujjanaḥ kāma rāga anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ vicikicchā anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ
translated: Two persons are those who have the underlying tendency of lust but not the underlying tendency of doubt. An ordinary person is one who has the underlying tendency of lust and also the underlying tendency of doubt.

original: Yo vā pana vicikicchānusayena sānusayo so kāmarāgānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana vicikicchā anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ kāma rāga anusayena sa anusayaḥ iti āmantā
translated: Or does anyone who is bound up with the underlying tendency to doubt also have the underlying tendency to lust for sensual desires?

original: Yo kāmarāgānusayena sānusayo so bhavarāgānusayena …pe… avijjānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ kāma rāga anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ bhava rāga anusayena pe avijjā anusayena sa anusayaḥ ti āmantā
translated: Does anyone who has the underlying tendency to lust for sensual desires also have the underlying tendency to lust for existence…to ignorance?

original: Yo vā pana avijjānusayena sānusayo so kāmarāgānusayena sānusayoti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana avijjā anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ kāma rāga anusayena sa anusayaḥ ti
translated: Or does anyone who has the underlying tendency to ignorance also have the underlying tendency to lust for sensual desires?

original: Anāgāmī avijjānusayena sānusayo, no ca kāmarāgānusayena sānusayo. Tayo puggalā avijjānusayena ca sānusayā kāmarāgānusayena ca sānusayā.
analyzed: anāgāmī avijjā anusayena sa anusayaḥ no ca kāmarāga anusayena sa anusayaḥ tayo puggalā avijjā anusayena ca sa anusayā kāmarāga anusayena ca sa anusayā
translated: A non-returner has the underlying tendency to ignorance but not the underlying tendency to lust for sensual desires. Three kinds of persons have the underlying tendency to ignorance and also the underlying tendency to lust for sensual desires.

original: Yo paṭighānusayena sānusayo so mānānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ paṭigha anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ māna anusayena sa anusayaḥ iti āmantā
translated: Does anyone who has the underlying tendency to resentment also have the underlying tendency to conceit?

original: Yo vā pana mānānusayena sānusayo so paṭighānusayena sānusayoti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana māna anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ paṭigha anusayena sa anusayaḥ iti
translated: Or does anyone who has the underlying tendency to conceit also have the underlying tendency to resentment?

original: Anāgāmī mānānusayena sānusayo, no ca paṭighānusayena sānusayo. Tayo puggalā mānānusayena ca sānusayā paṭighānusayena ca sānusayā.
analyzed: anāgāmī māna anusayena sa anusayaḥ no ca paṭigha anusayena sa anusayaḥ tayo puggalā māna anusayena ca sa anusayā paṭigha anusayena ca sa anusayā
translated: A non-returner has the underlying tendency to conceit but not the underlying tendency to resentment. Three kinds of persons have the underlying tendency to conceit and also the underlying tendency to resentment.

original: Yo paṭighānusayena sānusayo so diṭṭhānusayena …pe… vicikicchānusayena sānusayoti?
analyzed: yaḥ paṭigha anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ diṭṭha anusayena pe vicikicchā anusayena sa anusayo ti
translated: Is anyone who is determined by resentment also determined by the view of holding a position as supreme, or by the view of regarding rules and observances as supreme, or by doubt?

original: Dve puggalā paṭighānusayena sānusayā, no ca vicikicchānusayena sānusayā. Puthujjano paṭighānusayena ca sānusayo vicikicchānusayena ca sānusayo.
analyzed: dve puggalā paṭighā anusayena sa anusayā no ca vicikicchā anusayena sa anusayā puthujjanaḥ paṭighā anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ vicikicchā anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ
translated: Two persons are determined by resentment but not by doubt. The worldling is determined by resentment and by doubt.

original: Yo vā pana vicikicchānusayena sānusayo so paṭighānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.🔽Yo paṭighānusayena sānusayo so bhavarāgānusayena …pe… avijjānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana vicikicchā anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ paṭigha anusayena sa anusayaḥ ti āmantā  yaḥ paṭigha anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ bhava rāga anusayena pe avijjā anusayena sa anusayaḥ ti āmantā
translated: Or is anyone who is determined by doubt also determined by resentment?🔽Is anyone who is determined by resentment also determined by lust for existence, or by ignorance?

original: Yo vā pana avijjānusayena sānusayo so paṭighānusayena sānusayoti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana avijjā anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ paṭigha anusayena sa anusayaḥ ti
translated: Or is anyone who is determined by ignorance also determined by resentment?

original: Anāgāmī avijjānusayena sānusayo, no ca paṭighānusayena sānusayo. Tayo puggalā avijjānusayena ca sānusayā paṭighānusayena ca sānusayā.
analyzed: anāgāmī avijjā anusayena sa anusayaḥ no ca paṭigha anusayena sa anusayaḥ tayo puggalā avijjā anusayena ca sa anusayā paṭigha anusayena ca sa anusayā
translated: The non-returner is determined by ignorance but not by resentment. Three persons are determined by ignorance and by resentment.

analyzed: yaḥ māna anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ diṭṭha anusayena pe vicikicchā anusayena sa anusayaḥ ti
translated: Is anyone who is determined by conceit also determined by the view of holding a position as supreme, or by the view of regarding rules and observances as supreme, or by doubt?

original: Tayo puggalā mānānusayena sānusayā, no ca vicikicchānusayena sānusayā. Puthujjano mānānusayena ca sānusayo vicikicchānusayena ca sānusayo.
analyzed: tayo puggalā māna anusayena sa anusayāḥ no ca vicikicchā anusayena sa anusayā puthujjanaḥ māna anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ vicikicchā anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ
translated: Three persons are possessed by the underlying tendency to conceit, but not by the underlying tendency to scepticism. The worldling is possessed by the underlying tendency to conceit and by the underlying tendency to scepticism.

original: Yo vā pana vicikicchānusayena sānusayo so mānānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana vicikicchā anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ māna anusayena sa anusayaḥ iti āmantā
translated: Or is he who is possessed by the underlying tendency to scepticism also possessed by the underlying tendency to conceit?

original: Yo mānānusayena sānusayo so bhavarāgānusayena …pe… avijjānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ māna anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ bhava rāga anusayena pe avijjā anusayena sa anusayaḥ ti āmantā
translated: He who is possessed by the underlying tendency to conceit is also possessed by the underlying tendency to lust for existence … by the underlying tendency to ignorance.

original: Yo vā pana avijjānusayena sānusayo so mānānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.🔽Yo diṭṭhānusayena sānusayo so vicikicchānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.🔽Yo vā pana vicikicchānusayena sānusayo so diṭṭhānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā …pe….

translated: Or is he who is possessed by the underlying tendency to ignorance also possessed by the underlying tendency to conceit?🔽He who is possessed by the underlying tendency to conceit is also possessed by the underlying tendency to lust for existence … by the underlying tendency to ignorance.🔽Or is he who is possessed by the underlying tendency to ignorance also possessed by the underlying tendency to conceit?🔽He who is possessed by the underlying tendency to conceit is also possessed by the underlying tendency to lust for existence … by the underlying tendency to ignorance.

original: Yo vicikicchānusayena sānusayo so bhavarāgānusayena …pe… avijjānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vicikicchā anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ bhava rāga anusayena pe avijjā anusayena sa anusayaḥ ti āmantā
translated: Or is he who is possessed by the underlying tendency to ignorance also possessed by the underlying tendency to conceit?🔽He who is possessed by the underlying tendency to conceit is also possessed by the underlying tendency to lust for existence … by the underlying tendency to ignorance.

original: Yo vā pana avijjānusayena sānusayo so vicikicchānusayena sānusayoti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana avijjā anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ vicikicchā anusayena sa anusayaḥ ti
translated: Or is he who is possessed by the underlying tendency to ignorance also possessed by the underlying tendency to conceit?

original: Tayo puggalā avijjānusayena sānusayā, no ca vicikicchānusayena sānusayā. Puthujjano avijjānusayena ca sānusayo vicikicchānusayena ca sānusayo.
analyzed: tayo puggalā avijjā anusayena sa anusayāḥ no ca vicikicchā anusayena sa anusayā puthujjanaḥ avijjā anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ vicikicchā anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ

original: Yo bhavarāgānusayena sānusayo so avijjānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ bhava rāga anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ avijja anusayena sa anusayaḥ ti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana avijjānusayena sānusayo so bhavarāgānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā. (Ekamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana avijjā anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ bhava rāga anusayena sa anusayaḥ iti āmantā ekamūlaka

analyzed: yaḥ kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ saḥ māna anusayena sa anusayaḥ iti āmantā
translated: Is anyone who is possessed by the underlying tendency to lust for sensual desires and by the underlying tendency to resentment possessed by the underlying tendency to conceit?

analyzed: yaḥ vā pana māna anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ iti

analyzed: anāgāmī māna anusayena sa anusayaḥ no ca kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ tayo puggalā māna anusayena ca sa anusayā kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena ca sa anusayā
translated: The nonreturner is possessed by the underlying tendency to conceit, but is not possessed by the underlying tendency to lust for sensual desires and by the underlying tendency to resentment. Three persons are possessed by the underlying tendency to conceit and by the underlying tendency to lust for sensual desires and by the underlying tendency to resentment.

original: Yo kāmarāgānusayena ca paṭighānusayena ca sānusayo so diṭṭhānusayena …pe… vicikicchānusayena sānusayoti?

translated: “Are those who are with the underlying tendency of lust for sensual pleasures and with the underlying tendency of resentment also with the underlying tendency of views … with the underlying tendency of uncertainty?”

analyzed: dve puggalā kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena ca sa anusayā no ca vicikicchā anusayena

analyzed: yaḥ vā pana vicikicchā anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ iti āmantā
translated: “Or are those who are with the underlying tendency of uncertainty also with the underlying tendency of lust for sensual pleasures and with the underlying tendency of resentment?”

original: Yo kāmarāgānusayena ca paṭighānusayena ca sānusayo so bhavarāgānusayena …pe… avijjānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ saḥ bhava rāga anusayena pe avijjā anusayena sa anusayaḥ ti āmantā
translated: “Are those who are with the underlying tendency of lust for sensual pleasures and with the underlying tendency of resentment also with the underlying tendency of lust for existence … with the underlying tendency of ignorance?”

analyzed: yaḥ vā pana avijjā anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ ti

analyzed: anāgāmī avijjā anusayena sa anusayaḥ no ca kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ
translated: The non-returner is with the underlying tendency of ignorance, but not with the underlying tendency of lust for sensual pleasures and with the underlying tendency of resentment.

original: Tayo puggalā avijjānusayena ca sānusayā kāmarāgānusayena ca paṭighānusayena ca sānusayā. (Dukamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: tayo puggalā avijjā anusayena ca sa anusayā kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena ca sa anusayā
translated: Three persons are so by means of the underlying tendency to ignorance and by means of the underlying tendency to lust for sensual desires and by means of the underlying tendency to resentment. 1

original: Yo kāmarāgānusayena ca paṭighānusayena ca mānānusayena ca sānusayo so diṭṭhānusayena …pe… vicikicchānusayena sānusayoti?

analyzed: vicikicchā anusayena sa anusayā puthujjanaḥ kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena ca māna anusayena
translated: by means of the underlying tendency to uncertainty. An ordinary man is so by means of the underlying tendency to lust for sensual desires and by means of the underlying tendency to resentment and by means of the underlying tendency to conceit

original: ca sānusayo vicikicchānusayena ca sānusayo.🔽Yo vā pana vicikicchānusayena sānusayo so kāmarāgānusayena ca paṭighānusayena ca mānānusayena ca sānusayoti? Āmantā.
analyzed: ca sa anusayaḥ vicikicchā anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ  yaḥ vā pana vicikicchā anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena ca māna anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ iti āmantā
translated: and by means of the underlying tendency to uncertainty.🔽Or is anyone who is so by means of the underlying tendency to uncertainty so by means of the underlying tendency to lust for sensual desires and by means of the underlying tendency to resentment and by means of the underlying tendency to conceit?

original: Yo kāmarāgānusayena ca paṭighānusayena ca mānānusayena ca sānusayo so bhavarāgānusayena …pe… avijjānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena ca māna anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ saḥ bhava rāga anusayena pe avijjā anusayena sa anusayaḥ ti āmantā
translated: Is anyone who is so by means of the underlying tendency to lust for sensual desires and by means of the underlying tendency to resentment and by means of the underlying tendency to conceit so by means of the underlying tendency to lust for existence … by means of the underlying tendency to ignorance?

original: Yo vā pana avijjānusayena sānusayo so kāmarāgānusayena ca paṭighānusayena ca mānānusayena ca sānusayoti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana avijjā anusayena sa anusayaḥ saḥ kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena ca māna anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ iti
translated: Or is one who is accompanied by the underlying tendency to ignorance also accompanied by the underlying tendency to lust for sensual pleasure, by the underlying tendency to aversion, and by the underlying tendency to conceit?

original: Anāgāmī avijjānusayena ca mānānusayena ca sānusayo, no ca kāmarāgānusayena ca paṭighānusayena🔽ca sānusayo. Tayo puggalā avijjānusayena ca sānusayā kāmarāgānusayena ca paṭighānusayena
analyzed: anāgāmī avijjā anusayena ca māna anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ no ca kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena  ca sa anusayaḥ tayo puggalā avijjā anusayena ca sa anusayā kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena
translated: A non-returner is accompanied by the underlying tendency to ignorance and by the underlying tendency to conceit, but not by the underlying tendency to lust for sensual pleasure and by the underlying tendency to aversion.

original: ca mānānusayena ca sānusayā. (Tikamūlakaṁ.)🔽Yo kāmarāgānusayena ca paṭighānusayena ca mānānusayena ca diṭṭhānusayena ca sānusayo so vicikicchānusayena sānusayoti? Āmantā.
analyzed: ca māna anusayena ca sa anusayā tikamūlaka  yaḥ kāma rāga anusayena ca paṭigha anusayena ca māna anusayena ca diṭṭha anusayena ca sa anusayaḥ saḥ vicikicchā anusayena sa anusayaḥ iti āmantā
